Manterror/Stinkbomb/ Ramhorn/ Injector:

::Injector slams into the prism, firing off his stinger missiles at Sniper, 
rolling to the left, cyber pusles ripping into the powerful machinery::

::Manterror fired off a few ion disks at where Stinkbomb and Ramhorn were, 
yelling as cyber pulses, slamming into the prism, firing off an ion disk 
accidentaly, the disk slicing through one of the two computer controls 
(hitting the controls) the screen flashing with bright red letters: 

WARNING: POWER FLOW INTERRUPTED, BUILD UP IN PLASMA ENERGY DANGEROUS, 
DESTRUCTION IMMINENT, IN TEN MINUTES UNLESS FLOW IS REPAIRED, EXCESS ENERGY 
MUST BE RELIEVED UNTIL CONTROLS CAN COMPENSATE OR REPAIRS ARE MADE

::Manterror turned, firing off an ion disk at the attacker::

::Stinkbomb came around the corner, falling to his back as cyber pulses dug 
into him::

::Ramhorn came around the opposite corner, kicking Manterror, and seeing 
cyber pulses digging into Stinkbomb from Sniper, he opened fire with his 
sonic shells at Sniper::
